name: Ring of Yaxche
description: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.
refinements:
Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by **0.6**
% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of **16**
%.

Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by **0.7**
% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of **20**
%.

Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by **0.8**
% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of **24**
%.

Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by **0.9**
% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of **28**
%.

Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by **1**
% for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of **32**
%.
